issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Currently, if vmem/pmem check is not enabled, ContainerMonitor would not run.  In certain cases, ContainerMonitor also needs to run to monitor things like container-metrics.
fields.summary: Provide an option to enable ContainerMonitor

This message was automatically generated.

Couple of comments.
* In the call to GenericTestUtils#waitFor, the 2nd and 3rd parameters (500 and 200) should be interchanged.
* The test failure seems related. I think we need to shutdown DefaultMetricsSystem or simply use another container ID in the test to get rid of the error.

[~varun_saxena],  Thank you a lot for the comments !
Addressed them.
